00031 RDFSyntaxMediator::RDFSyntaxMediator() {
00032 }

00034 string *node = new string[3];
00035 
00041 void RDFTripleHandle(void* dictionaryTriples, const raptor_statement* triple) {
00042 
00043     char *returned_subject;
00044     char *returned_predicate;
00045     char *returned_object;
00046 
00047     returned_subject = (char*) raptor_statement_part_as_string(triple->subject,
00048             triple->subject_type, NULL, NULL);
00049     node[0] = returned_subject;
00050 
00051     returned_predicate = (char*) raptor_statement_part_as_string(
00052             triple->predicate, triple->predicate_type, NULL, NULL);
00053     node[1] = returned_predicate;
00054 
00055     returned_object = (char*) raptor_statement_part_as_string(triple->object,
00056             triple->object_type, triple->object_literal_datatype,
00057             triple->object_literal_language);
00058     node[2] = returned_object;
00059 
00060     ((DictionaryTriples *) dictionaryTriples)->dictionary->checkTriple(node);
00061     //cout<<"triple:"<<node[0]<<" "<<node[1]<<" "<<node[2]<< " .\n";
00062     *(((DictionaryTriples *) dictionaryTriples)->ntriples)
00063             = *(((DictionaryTriples *) dictionaryTriples)->ntriples) + 1;
00064 
00065     free ( returned_subject), free(returned_predicate), free(returned_object);
00066 
00067 }
00068 
00074 void RDFFullTripleHandle(void* dictionaryTriples,
00075         const raptor_statement* triple) {
00076 
00077     char *returned_subject;
00078     char *returned_predicate;
00079     char *returned_object;
00080 
00081     returned_subject = (char*) raptor_statement_part_as_string(triple->subject,
00082             triple->subject_type, NULL, NULL);
00083     node[0] = returned_subject;
00084 
00085     returned_predicate = (char*) raptor_statement_part_as_string(
00086             triple->predicate, triple->predicate_type, NULL, NULL);
00087     node[1] = returned_predicate;
00088 
00089     returned_object = (char*) raptor_statement_part_as_string(triple->object,
00090             triple->object_type, triple->object_literal_datatype,
00091             triple->object_literal_language);
00092     node[2] = returned_object;
00093 
00094     //cout<<"triple:"<<node[0]<<" "<<node[1]<<" "<<node[2]<< " .\n";
00095 
00096     int subject =
00097             ((DictionaryTriples *) dictionaryTriples)->dictionary->retrieveID(
00098                     node[0], VOC_SUBJECT);
00099     int predicate =
00100             ((DictionaryTriples *) dictionaryTriples)->dictionary->retrieveID(
00101                     node[1], VOC_PREDICATE);
00102     int object =
00103             ((DictionaryTriples *) dictionaryTriples)->dictionary->retrieveID(
00104                     node[2], VOC_OBJECT);
00105 
00106     ((DictionaryTriples *) dictionaryTriples)->triples->insert(subject,
00107             predicate, object);
00108 
00109     free ( returned_subject), free(returned_predicate), free(returned_object);
00110 
00111 }
00112 
00118 void serialize_triple(void* rdf_serializer, const raptor_statement* triple) {
00119     raptor_serialize_statement((raptor_serializer*) rdf_serializer, triple);
00120 }
00121 
00127 void relay_namespaces(void* namespacesData, raptor_namespace *nspace) {
00128     ((vector<raptor_namespace*>*) namespacesData)->push_back(nspace);
00129 }
00130 
00136 bool RDFSyntaxMediator::parsing(char *pathFile,
00137         DictionaryTriples dictionaryTriples) {
00138     unsigned char *uri_string;
00139     raptor_uri *uri, *base_uri;
00140 
00141     raptor_init();
00142 
00143     rdf_parser = raptor_new_parser("guess");
00144 
00145     if (dictionaryTriples.triples == NULL) //parse dictionary
00146     {
00147         raptor_set_statement_handler(rdf_parser, &dictionaryTriples,
00148                 RDFTripleHandle);
00149     } else {
00150         raptor_set_statement_handler(rdf_parser, &dictionaryTriples,
00151                 RDFFullTripleHandle);
00152     }
00153     raptor_set_namespace_handler(rdf_parser, &namespaces, relay_namespaces);
00154 
00155     uri_string = raptor_uri_filename_to_uri_string(pathFile);
00156     uri = raptor_new_uri(uri_string);
00157     base_uri = raptor_uri_copy(uri);
00158 
00159     raptor_parse_file(rdf_parser, uri, base_uri);
00160 
00161     raptor_free_parser( rdf_parser);
00162 
00163     raptor_free_uri(base_uri);
00164     raptor_free_uri(uri);
00165     raptor_free_memory(uri_string);
00166 
00167     raptor_finish();
00168     return true;
00169 }
00170 
00176 bool RDFSyntaxMediator::init_serialize(char *pathFile, char *format) {
00177 
00178     unsigned char *uri_string;
00179     raptor_uri *uri, *base_uri;
00180 
00181     raptor_init();
00182 
00183     rdf_parser = raptor_new_parser("ntriples");
00184 
00185     try {
00186         rdf_serializer = raptor_new_serializer(format); //format can be e.g. rdfxml
00187         raptor_serialize_start_to_filename(rdf_serializer, pathFile);
00188 
00189         raptor_start_parse(rdf_parser, NULL);
00190         raptor_set_statement_handler(rdf_parser, rdf_serializer,
00191                 serialize_triple);
00192 
00193         int i = 0;
00194 
00195         //set namespaces if presented in previous parser
00196         if (namespaces.size() > 0) {
00197             for (i = 0; i < namespaces.size(); i++)
00198                 ;
00199             {
00200                 raptor_serialize_set_namespace_from_namespace(rdf_serializer,
00201                         namespaces[i]);
00202             }
00203         }
00204     }
00205 
00206     catch (char * str) {
00207         cout << "Exception while conversing to " << format << ": " << str
00208                 << '\n';
00209     }
00210 
00211     return true;
00212 }

00220 bool RDFSyntaxMediator::serialize_statement(string subject, string predicate,
00221         string object) {
00222 
00223     size_t buffer_len;
00224 
00225     //buffer_len = subject.length()+predicate.length()+object.length()+5;
00226     //unsigned char* buffer = new unsigned char[buffer_len];
00227     //cout<<"(len)subject predicate object:("<<buffer_len<<")"<<subject<<" "<<predicate<<" "<<object<<".\n";
00228     //fflush(stdout);
00229     //char* buffer = new char[buffer_len];
00230     string statement;
00231     statement.append(subject).append(" ").append(predicate).append(" ").append(
00232             object).append(" .\n");
00233     //cout<<"statement:"<<statement<<"\n";
00234     //cout<<"object:"<<object<<"(len:"<<object.length()<<"\n";
00235     //fflush(stdout);
00236     /*
00237      strcpy((char*)buffer,(char*)subject.c_str());
00238      strcat((char*)buffer," ");
00239      strcat((char*)buffer,(char*)predicate.c_str());
00240      strcat((char*)buffer," ");
00241      strcat((char*)buffer,(char*)object.c_str());
00242      strcat((char*)buffer," .\n");
00243      */
00244     //cout<<"buffer:"<<buffer<<"|\n";
00245     //fflush(stdout);
00246     // use '1' last parameter to run without buffering
00247 
00248     //raptor_parse_chunk(rdf_parser, (unsigned char*)buffer, buffer_len, 1);
00249     raptor_parse_chunk(rdf_parser, (unsigned char*) statement.c_str(),
00250             statement.length(), 0);
00251 
00252     //delete [] buffer;
00253 }
00254 
00258 bool RDFSyntaxMediator::end_serialize() {
00259     raptor_parse_chunk(rdf_parser, NULL, 0, 1); /* no data and is_end = 1 */
00260     raptor_serialize_end( rdf_serializer);
00261     raptor_free_serializer(rdf_serializer);
00262     raptor_free_parser( rdf_parser);
00263     raptor_finish();
00264     return true;
00265 }
